content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with 2 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) with 2 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Stone furnace at position (6.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. Regularly check your inventory to avoid running out of essential materials.

### Errors when inserting items into full inventories
- Avoid attempting to insert items into furnaces that are already full. Check the inventory status of the furnace before inserting items to ensure there is available space.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities in the target location.
